Name: Homing Shapes
About the game: Homing Shapes is a 2D platformer like no other. Your projectiles home-in on the enemy shapes but only in a specific order. Targeting of the shapes is automatic allowing you just to focus on movement and shooting. Dodge and evade the enemy's home-in projectiles whilst you destroy them!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Homing Shapes? Check out the release date (Feb 24, 2019), developer insights from Fear Games, and a complete game summary.
